data.text: @cperruna Got any good lists of stocks where market cap is at yearly revenue or cash on hand?
@cperruna @ffocd I just slowly average down, then when I’m out of money I ignore it for as long as it takes. Not like I’m much better in cash.
@cperruna Chris  - any such data for 2008? Maybe we need to look further?

@ffocd This pattern across the board...

https://t.co/iaZQLEx17v

@cperruna Understood. Calling bottoms or tops is an impossible endeavor. I’m just wondering what indicators will compel you to move, or if you’ll simply average your way back in over the next several months.
@ffocd I don't call bottoms - nobody can, unless pure luck.
@cperruna What’s your call on a bottom or buy in strategy? Today’s action violated the previous low and I’d like to see support confirmed at least twice and ideally three times.
@cperruna To put things in perspective https://t.co/Y62JbxpNlk
@cperruna So that means we have more room to go down
@cperruna my man, fav chart ever!! thank you!!
